creator: Higher Education Strategy Associates
title: 2.21: Lumina Foundation & National Education Attainment Goals
author: Higher Education Strategy Associates
content:encoded: With us today is Courtney Brown, Vice President of Impact and Planning at Lumina Foundation and the person most responsible for making sure the foundation hits its goals and develops new and even more meaningful ones. The conversation covers how Lumina went about its goal setting process, what tactics it's used to build a wide network of alliances across the U.S., how close it's come to succeeding in its goals, and what the organization's next set of goals might be.
